From vision
to construction,
we make it happen.

At Lumix Construction Corp, we are committed to excellence in civil construction.
Established in 2017 and based in Doral, Florida, our company specializes in
earthwork, water, sewer, and drainage solutions.
With a focus on quality, efficiency, and innovation,
we deliver top-tier infrastructure projects that enhance communities and drive progress.
